shared.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.board.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the game board for a Qubic game.
    Author:
    beitske

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DIM 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Creates a new board filled with beautiful emptiness.

    • Constructor Detail

        public Board()

    • Method Detail

      • deepCopy

        public Board deepCopy()
               throws shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException
        Creates a new Board with an exact copy of the contents of the current board.
        Returns:
        new Board newBoard with a copy of the current boards contents
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException - if field is out of range

      • isField

        public boolean isField(int row,
                       int col,
                       int lay)
        Checks if either player or bot aren't cheating by entering an invalid field. We're watching you.
        Parameters:
        row - number of the row (or X-coordinate)
        col - number of the column (or Y-coordinate)
        lay - number of the layer (or Z-coordinate)
        Returns:
        true if 0 <= row && row < DIM && 0 <= col && col < DIM && 0 <= lay && lay < DIM

      • getField

        public shared.board.Mark getField(int row,
                                  int col,
                                  int lay)
                           throws shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException
        Return the content on field referred to by the parameters.
        Parameters:
        row - number of the row
        col - number of the column
        lay - number of the layer
        Returns:
        Mark on the field
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException - if field out of range

      • isEmptyField

        public boolean isEmptyField(int row,
                            int col,
                            int lay)
                     throws shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException
        Checks if the content of the field referred to is empty.
        Parameters:
        row - no of the row
        col - no of the column
        lay - no of the layer
        Returns:
        true if getField(row, col, lay) == Mark.EMPTY
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException - if field out of range

      • isFull

        public boolean isFull()
        Checks if all fields on the board are filled with either mark XX or OO
        Returns:
        true if all fields are not filled with Mark.EMPTY

      • gameOver

        public boolean gameOver()
        Determines if the end of the game is present.
        Returns:
        true if the game has a winner or when there is a draw (isFull)

      • belowIsNotEmpty

        public boolean belowIsNotEmpty(int row,
                               int col,
                               int lay)
                        throws shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException
        Checks if the same spot on the layer below is empty, if there is one.
        Parameters:
        row - no of the row
        col - no of the column
        lay - no of the layer
        Returns:
        true if lay == 0 || !(isEmptyField(row, col, (lay - 1)))
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException - if field is out of range

      • setField

        public void setField(int row,
                     int col,
                     int lay,
                     shared.board.Mark m)
              throws shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException
        Sets the mark on the field referred to by the parameters to the given Mark.
        Parameters:
        row - no of the row
        col - no of the column
        lay - no of the layer
        m - the Mark to conquer this field with
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException - if field is out of range

      • hasRow

        public boolean hasRow(shared.board.Mark m)
               throws shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException
        Checks if the Board has a row with given Mark
        Parameters:
        m - the mark
        Returns:
        true if there is a row controlled by m
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException - if field is out of range

      • hasColumn

        public boolean hasColumn(shared.board.Mark m)
                  throws shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException
        Checks if the Board has a column with given Mark m
        Parameters:
        m - the mark
        Returns:
        true if there is a column controlled by m
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException - if field is out of range

      • hasTower

        public boolean hasTower(shared.board.Mark m)
                 throws shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException
        Checks if the board has a vertical row, a so called tower*, with Mark m *Disclaimer: No princess present.
        Parameters:
        m - the mark
        Returns:
        true if a vertical row is controlled by m
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException - if field is out of range

      • hasDiagonal

        public boolean hasDiagonal(shared.board.Mark m)
                    throws shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException
        Checks if the Board has a diagonal with row Mark m
        Parameters:
        m - the mark
        Returns:
        true if the a diagonal row is controlled by m
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.CoordinatesNotFoundException - if field is out of range

      • isWinner

        public boolean isWinner(shared.board.Mark m)
                 throws shared.exceptions.InvalidArgumentException
        Checks if there is a winner with the given Mark m
        Parameters:
        m - the mark
        Returns:
        true if m returns true at hasRow, hasColumn, hasDiagonal or hasTower.
        Throws:
        shared.exceptions.InvalidArgumentException - if the mark is Mark.EMPTY

      • hasWinner

        public boolean hasWinner()
        Checks if there is a winner on the board (although we're all winners)
        Returns:
        true if Mark.OO or Mark.XX isWinner

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the board by filling the fields with Mark.EMPTY. All current fields on the board will return to dust.

      • toStringLayer

        public java.lang.String toStringLayer(int layer)
        Returns a string representation of the current layer. Also conveniently shows a number representation of the layer. Oh wait, it's a TUI, so we don't. It could get very messy with all the numbers. I kindly refer to the other toString() method for a more complete approach to toStringness.
        Returns:
        The current layer represented in a String.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
